top_risks.section: ERASURE, RETURN AND RETENTION OF DATA
top_risks.summary: Matches standard (sim=1.00) but triggers rules: infosec_14.

top_risks.section: The Customer acts as a Data Controller
DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA

flags.input_clause_section: The Customer acts as a Data Controller
flags.input_text: The Data Controller wishes to subcontract certain services involving the processing of Personal Data (defined below), to the Processor, which is to further the Services provided by the Processor to the Data controller (“Purpose”).
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Data Controller wishes to subcontract certain services involving the processing of Personal Data (defined below), to the Processor, which is to further the Services provided by the Processor to the Data controller (“Purpose”).
flags.raw_text: The Data Controller wishes to subcontract certain services involving the processing of Personal Data (defined below), to the Processor, which is to further the Services provided by the Processor to the Data controller (“Purpose”).

flags.input_text: As per the recitals of this DPA, solely for the purposes of provision of Services by the Processor to the Data Controller:
flags.matched_playbook_text: As per the recitals of this DPA, solely for the purposes of provision of Services by the Processor to the Data Controller:
flags.raw_text: As per the recitals of this DPA, solely for the purposes of provision of Services by the Processor to the Data Controller:

flags.input_text: the Data Controller shall provide the Processor access to certain Personal Data for the Purpose; and
flags.matched_playbook_text: the Data Controller shall provide the Processor access to certain Personal Data for the Purpose; and
flags.raw_text: the Data Controller shall provide the Processor access to certain Personal Data for the Purpose; and

flags.input_text: the Processor shall Process such Personal Data strictly in accordance with: (a) all applicable Data Protection Laws to extent expressly and directly applicable to the Processor; (b) written instructions of the Data Controller relevant to Processing for the provision of Services under the Master Service Agreement; and (c) the terms of this DPA.
flags.matched_playbook_text: the Processor shall Process such Personal Data strictly in accordance with: (a) all applicable Data Protection Laws to extent expressly and directly applicable to the Processor; (b) written instructions of the Data Controller relevant to Processing for the provision of Services under the Master Service Agreement; and (c) the terms of this DPA.
flags.raw_text: the Processor shall Process such Personal Data strictly in accordance with: (a) all applicable Data Protection Laws to extent expressly and directly applicable to the Processor; (b) written instructions of the Data Controller relevant to Processing for the provision of Services under the Master Service Agreement; and (c) the terms of this DPA.

flags.input_text: The Processor shall immediately inform the Data Controller where it is of the reasonable opinion that (i) any Processing is in violation of the Applicable Laws (ii) the Personal Data accessed by the Processor, in the context of the performance of the Agreement, is deemed excessive or unnecessary for the performance of this Agreement.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Processor shall immediately inform the Data Controller where it is of the reasonable opinion that (i) any Processing is in violation of the Applicable Laws (ii) the Personal Data accessed by the Processor, in the context of the performance of the Agreement, is deemed excessive or unnecessary for the performance of this Agreement.
flags.raw_text: The Processor shall immediately inform the Data Controller where it is of the reasonable opinion that (i) any Processing is in violation of the Applicable Laws (ii) the Personal Data accessed by the Processor, in the context of the performance of the Agreement, is deemed excessive or unnecessary for the performance of this Agreement.

flags.input_text: In the event the Processor is of its reasonable opinion that an instruction; (i) violates Data Protection Laws, or (ii) requires access to excessive or unnecessary Personal Data; or (iii) would expose the Processor to liability; the Processor may suspend Processing till the Data Controller provides modified lawful instructions. Parties hereby acknowledge and agree that the Processor shall not be liable for any consequences in relation to the Processor explicitly following the written instructions of the Data Controller to the extent that such acts of the Processor are carried out lawfully and in accordance with other contractual provisions under this DPA.
flags.matched_playbook_text: In the event the Processor is of its reasonable opinion that an instruction; (i) violates Data Protection Laws, or (ii) requires access to excessive or unnecessary Personal Data; or (iii) would expose the Processor to liability; the Processor may suspend Processing till the Data Controller provides modified lawful instructions. Parties hereby acknowledge and agree that the Processor shall not be liable for any consequences in relation to the Processor explicitly following the written instructions of the Data Controller to the extent that such acts of the Processor are carried out lawfully and in accordance with other contractual provisions under this DPA.
flags.raw_text: In the event the Processor is of its reasonable opinion that an instruction; (i) violates Data Protection Laws, or (ii) requires access to excessive or unnecessary Personal Data; or (iii) would expose the Processor to liability; the Processor may suspend Processing till the Data Controller provides modified lawful instructions. Parties hereby acknowledge and agree that the Processor shall not be liable for any consequences in relation to the Processor explicitly following the written instructions of the Data Controller to the extent that such acts of the Processor are carried out lawfully and in accordance with other contractual provisions under this DPA.

flags.input_text: For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that the obligations of the Processor in this DPA are without prejudice to the use of information by the Processor that is derived from any Personal Data for optimisation, improvement and development of the service offerings of the Processor in the ordinary course of its business.
flags.matched_playbook_text: For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that the obligations of the Processor in this DPA are without prejudice to the use of information by the Processor that is derived from any Personal Data for optimisation, improvement and development of the service offerings of the Processor in the ordinary course of its business.
flags.raw_text: For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that the obligations of the Processor in this DPA are without prejudice to the use of information by the Processor that is derived from any Personal Data for optimisation, improvement and development of the service offerings of the Processor in the ordinary course of its business.

flags.input_clause_section: DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
flags.input_text: The Processor shall hold in strict confidence any and all Personal Data disclosed to or accessed by the Processor in accordance with this DPA.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Processor shall hold in strict confidence any and all Personal Data disclosed to or accessed by the Processor in accordance with this DPA.
flags.raw_text: The Processor shall hold in strict confidence any and all Personal Data disclosed to or accessed by the Processor in accordance with this DPA.

flags.input_clause_section: DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
flags.input_text: The Processor shall limit access to Personal Data to its Personnel who have a need to know the Personal Data as a condition to Processor’s performance of Services for the Data Controller.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Processor shall limit access to Personal Data to its Personnel who have a need to know the Personal Data as a condition to Processor’s performance of Services for the Data Controller.
flags.raw_text: The Processor shall limit access to Personal Data to its Personnel who have a need to know the Personal Data as a condition to Processor’s performance of Services for the Data Controller.

flags.input_clause_section: DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
flags.input_text: The list of Sub-processors which the Data Controller has already authorised is in Appendix B of this Agreement. In the event of on-boarding of any new Sub-processors or changes to existing Sub-processors, the Processor shall notify of such change at least 15 days in advance along with relevant information in re the change, and the Data Controller shall have the right to object to such change.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The list of Sub-processors which the Data Controller has already authorised is in Appendix B of this Agreement. In the event of on-boarding of any new Sub-processors or changes to existing Sub-processors, the Processor shall notify of such change at least 15 days in advance along with relevant information in re the change, and the Data Controller shall have the right to object to such change.
flags.raw_text: The list of Sub-processors which the Data Controller has already authorised is in Appendix B of this Agreement. In the event of on-boarding of any new Sub-processors or changes to existing Sub-processors, the Processor shall notify of such change at least 15 days in advance along with relevant information in re the change, and the Data Controller shall have the right to object to such change.

flags.input_clause_section: DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
flags.input_text: Where the Processor subcontracts any of the Processing operations to a third-party Sub-processor, the Processor shall enter into a written agreement with each such Sub-processor that imposes obligations on the Sub-processor that are identical to those imposed on the Processor under this DPA. Where the Sub-processor fails to fulfil these obligations, the Processor shall remain fully liable to the Data Controller for the performance of that Sub-processor’s obligations. It is hereby clarified that all obligations of the Processor in relation to its Personnel as set out hereunder (including under this Section 2), shall also apply mutatis mutandis to the involvement of any Sub-processors.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Where the Processor subcontracts any of the Processing operations to a third-party Sub-processor, the Processor shall enter into a written agreement with each such Sub-processor that imposes obligations on the Sub-processor that are identical to those imposed on the Processor under this DPA. Where the Sub-processor fails to fulfil these obligations, the Processor shall remain fully liable to the Data Controller for the performance of that Sub-processor’s obligations. It is hereby clarified that all obligations of the Processor in relation to its Personnel as set out hereunder (including under this Section 2), shall also apply mutatis mutandis to the involvement of any Sub-processors.
flags.raw_text: Where the Processor subcontracts any of the Processing operations to a third-party Sub-processor, the Processor shall enter into a written agreement with each such Sub-processor that imposes obligations on the Sub-processor that are identical to those imposed on the Processor under this DPA. Where the Sub-processor fails to fulfil these obligations, the Processor shall remain fully liable to the Data Controller for the performance of that Sub-processor’s obligations. It is hereby clarified that all obligations of the Processor in relation to its Personnel as set out hereunder (including under this Section 2), shall also apply mutatis mutandis to the involvement of any Sub-processors.

flags.input_clause_section: DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
flags.input_text: The Controller represents that it has the legal right and/ or appropriate consents (if applicable) under the Data Protection Laws to provide the Personal Data to the Processor for the Purpose.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Controller represents that it has the legal right and/ or appropriate consents (if applicable) under the Data Protection Laws to provide the Personal Data to the Processor for the Purpose.
flags.raw_text: The Controller represents that it has the legal right and/ or appropriate consents (if applicable) under the Data Protection Laws to provide the Personal Data to the Processor for the Purpose.

flags.input_clause_section: DISCLOSURE OF AND ACCESS TO PERSONAL DATA
flags.input_text: The Controller shall ensure that all Personal Data shared is accurate, complete and up to date. The Controller confirms that the Processor is not liable for verifying the accuracy or completeness of the Personal Data. The Processor shall not be held liable for any claims, losses or damages arising from the Processing of inaccurate, incomplete or outdated Personal Data shared by the Controller.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Controller shall ensure that all Personal Data shared is accurate, complete and up to date. The Controller confirms that the Processor is not liable for verifying the accuracy or completeness of the Personal Data. The Processor shall not be held liable for any claims, losses or damages arising from the Processing of inaccurate, incomplete or outdated Personal Data shared by the Controller.
flags.raw_text: The Controller shall ensure that all Personal Data shared is accurate, complete and up to date. The Controller confirms that the Processor is not liable for verifying the accuracy or completeness of the Personal Data. The Processor shall not be held liable for any claims, losses or damages arising from the Processing of inaccurate, incomplete or outdated Personal Data shared by the Controller.

flags.input_text: Processor will keep detailed, accurate, and up-to-date records regarding any Processing of Personal Data it carries out on behalf of the Data Controller and shall maintain any other records as required under Data Protection Laws (“Records”).
flags.matched_playbook_text: Processor will keep detailed, accurate, and up-to-date records regarding any Processing of Personal Data it carries out on behalf of the Data Controller and shall maintain any other records as required under Data Protection Laws (“Records”).
flags.raw_text: Processor will keep detailed, accurate, and up-to-date records regarding any Processing of Personal Data it carries out on behalf of the Data Controller and shall maintain any other records as required under Data Protection Laws (“Records”).

flags.input_text: The Processor will ensure that all Records of the Personal Data are accurate and are maintained and Processed as-is. Except as provided hereunder, the Processor shall not alter, change or edit the Personal Data or any aspect thereof.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Processor will ensure that all Records of the Personal Data are accurate and are maintained and Processed as-is. Except as provided hereunder, the Processor shall not alter, change or edit the Personal Data or any aspect thereof.
flags.raw_text: The Processor will ensure that all Records of the Personal Data are accurate and are maintained and Processed as-is. Except as provided hereunder, the Processor shall not alter, change or edit the Personal Data or any aspect thereof.

flags.input_clause_section: ERASURE, RETURN AND RETENTION OF DATA
flags.input_text: Subject to the requirements under Data Protection Laws (“Legal Purpose”), the Processor shall cease all use of, return, and delete all Personal Data from its records within a reasonable time frame [and no later than 60 (sixty) days] upon: (a) fulfilment of the Purpose, as specified in Appendix A; or (b) receipt of request from the Data Controller for deletion of such Personal Data, whichever is earlier.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Subject to the requirements under Data Protection Laws (“Legal Purpose”), the Processor shall cease all use of, return, and delete all Personal Data from its records within a reasonable time frame [and no later than 60 (sixty) days] upon: (a) fulfilment of the Purpose, as specified in Appendix A; or (b) receipt of request from the Data Controller for deletion of such Personal Data, whichever is earlier.

triggered_rules.clause: 4. ERASURE, RETURN AND RETENTION OF DATA

flags.explanation: Matches standard (sim=1.00) but triggers rules: infosec_14.
flags.suggested_redline:
30 days we can accept 

Rest of the clause should be in similar context as our std.template
flags.raw_text: Subject to the requirements under Data Protection Laws (“Legal Purpose”), the Processor shall cease all use of, return, and delete all Personal Data from its records within a reasonable time frame [and no later than 60 (sixty) days] upon: (a) fulfilment of the Purpose, as specified in Appendix A; or (b) receipt of request from the Data Controller for deletion of such Personal Data, whichever is earlier.

flags.input_clause_section: ERASURE, RETURN AND RETENTION OF DATA
flags.input_text: Any Personal Data retained for compliance with Legal Purpose, shall be deleted on completion of the Legal Purpose.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Any Personal Data retained for compliance with Legal Purpose, shall be deleted on completion of the Legal Purpose.
flags.raw_text: Any Personal Data retained for compliance with Legal Purpose, shall be deleted on completion of the Legal Purpose.

flags.input_clause_section: OTHER OBLIGATIONS OF THE DATA PROCESSOR
flags.input_text: Taking into account the state of the art, the costs of implementation and the nature, scope, context and purposes of Processing as well as the risk of varying likelihood and severity for the rights and freedoms of natural persons, Processor shall in relation to the Data Controller Personal Data implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to that risk, including, as appropriate, the measures referred to in Article 32(1) of the GDPR.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Taking into account the state of the art, the costs of implementation and the nature, scope, context and purposes of Processing as well as the risk of varying likelihood and severity for the rights and freedoms of natural persons, Processor shall in relation to the Data Controller Personal Data implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to that risk, including, as appropriate, the measures referred to in Article 32(1) of the GDPR.
flags.raw_text: Taking into account the state of the art, the costs of implementation and the nature, scope, context and purposes of Processing as well as the risk of varying likelihood and severity for the rights and freedoms of natural persons, Processor shall in relation to the Data Controller Personal Data implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to that risk, including, as appropriate, the measures referred to in Article 32(1) of the GDPR.

flags.input_clause_section: OTHER OBLIGATIONS OF THE DATA PROCESSOR
flags.input_text: In assessing the appropriate level of security, Processor shall take account in particular of the risks that are presented by Processing, in particular from a Personal Data Breach.
flags.matched_playbook_text: In assessing the appropriate level of security, Processor shall take account in particular of the risks that are presented by Processing, in particular from a Personal Data Breach.
flags.raw_text: In assessing the appropriate level of security, Processor shall take account in particular of the risks that are presented by Processing, in particular from a Personal Data Breach.

flags.input_text: Taking into account the nature of the Processing, Processor shall assist the Data Controller by implementing appropriate technical and organisational measures, insofar as this is possible, for the fulfilment of the Data Controller obligations, as reasonably understood by the Data Controller, to respond to requests to exercise Data Subject rights under the Data Protection Laws. Processor shall:
flags.matched_playbook_text: Taking into account the nature of the Processing, Processor shall assist the Data Controller by implementing appropriate technical and organisational measures, insofar as this is possible, for the fulfilment of the Data Controller obligations, as reasonably understood by the Data Controller, to respond to requests to exercise Data Subject rights under the Data Protection Laws. Processor shall:
flags.raw_text: Taking into account the nature of the Processing, Processor shall assist the Data Controller by implementing appropriate technical and organisational measures, insofar as this is possible, for the fulfilment of the Data Controller obligations, as reasonably understood by the Data Controller, to respond to requests to exercise Data Subject rights under the Data Protection Laws.

flags.input_text: notify Data Controller if it receives a request from a Data Subject under any Data Protection Law in respect of Personal Data; and
flags.matched_playbook_text: notify Data Controller if it receives a request from a Data Subject under any Data Protection Law in respect of Personal Data; and
flags.raw_text: notify Data Controller if it receives a request from a Data Subject under any Data Protection Law in respect of Personal Data; and

flags.input_text: ensure that it does not respond to that request except on the documented instructions of the Data Controller or as required by applicable Data Protection Laws to which the Processor is subject, in which case Processor shall to the extent permitted by applicable Data Protection Laws inform the Data Controller of the legal requirement before the it responds to the request.
flags.matched_playbook_text: ensure that it does not respond to that request except on the documented instructions of the Data Controller or as required by applicable Data Protection Laws to which the Processor is subject, in which case Processor shall to the extent permitted by applicable Data Protection Laws inform the Data Controller of the legal requirement before the it responds to the request.
flags.raw_text: ensure that it does not respond to that request except on the documented instructions of the Data Controller or as required by applicable Data Protection Laws to which the Processor is subject, in which case Processor shall to the extent permitted by applicable Data Protection Laws inform the Data Controller of the legal requirement before the it responds to the request.

flags.input_text: The Processor may transfer or authorize the transfer of Personal Data to Third-Party Countries without the prior written consent of the Data Controller. If personal data processed under this DPA is transferred to a Third-Party Country, the Parties shall import the relevant Standard Contractual Clauses to this DPA. Where the Standard Contractual Clauses are imported, for avoidance of doubt it is clarified that:
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Processor may transfer or authorize the transfer of Personal Data to Third-Party Countries without the prior written consent of the Data Controller. If personal data processed under this DPA is transferred to a Third-Party Country, the Parties shall import the relevant Standard Contractual Clauses to this DPA. Where the Standard Contractual Clauses are imported, for avoidance of doubt it is clarified that:
flags.raw_text: The Processor may transfer or authorize the transfer of Personal Data to Third-Party Countries without the prior written consent of the Data Controller. If personal data processed under this DPA is transferred to a Third-Party Country, the Parties shall import the relevant Standard Contractual Clauses to this DPA. Where the Standard Contractual Clauses are imported, for avoidance of doubt it is clarified that:

flags.input_text: Module Two of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall be applicable to the Personal Data transfer.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Module Two of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall be applicable to the Personal Data transfer.
flags.raw_text: Module Two of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall be applicable to the Personal Data transfer.

flags.input_text: Option Two under Clause 9 of the Standard Contractual Clauses in relation to use of Sub-processors shall be applicable, and time duration for objections as set out in Clause 2.4 of this DPA shall be applicable.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Option Two under Clause 9 of the Standard Contractual Clauses in relation to use of Sub-processors shall be applicable, and time duration for objections as set out in Clause 2.4 of this DPA shall be applicable.
flags.raw_text: Option Two under Clause 9 of the Standard Contractual Clauses in relation to use of Sub-processors shall be applicable, and time duration for objections as set out in Clause 2.4 of this DPA shall be applicable.

flags.input_text: The option under Clause 11 of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall not apply.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The option under Clause 11 of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall not apply.
flags.raw_text: The option under Clause 11 of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall not apply.

flags.input_text: [The supervisory authority shall be as indicated in Appendix C, Annex I.C., as required under Clause 13 of the Standard Contractual Clauses].
flags.matched_playbook_text: [The supervisory authority shall be as indicated in Appendix C, Annex I.C., as required under Clause 13 of the Standard Contractual Clauses].
flags.raw_text: [The supervisory authority shall be as indicated in Appendix C, Annex I.C., as required under Clause 13 of the Standard Contractual Clauses].

flags.matched_playbook_text: [The governing law for the Standard Contractual Clauses shall be of the jurisdiction of (insert), as per Clause 17 of the Standard Contractual Clauses].

flags.matched_playbook_text: The choice of forum and jurisdiction for the Standard Contractual Clauses shall be (insert), as per Clause 18 of the Standard Contractual Clauses.

flags.input_text: Relevant annexures of the Standard Contractual Clauses that have to be filled up, have been set out in the appropriate appendices to this DPA.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Relevant annexures of the Standard Contractual Clauses that have to be filled up, have been set out in the appropriate appendices to this DPA.
flags.raw_text: Relevant annexures of the Standard Contractual Clauses that have to be filled up, have been set out in the appropriate appendices to this DPA.

flags.input_text: In relation to this DPA if there is any contradiction between the terms of this DPA and the terms of the Standard Contractual Clauses, the terms of the Standard Contractual Clauses shall prevail. In all other situations, this DPA shall prevail. For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that to the extent not captured in the Standard Contractual Clauses (when applicable), the rights and obligations of the Parties captured in the DPA will apply.

In all other situations, this DPA shall prevail. For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that to the extent not captured in the Standard Contractual Clauses (when applicable), the rights and obligations of the Parties captured in the DPA will apply.

In all other situations, this DPA shall prevail. For the avoidance of doubt, it is clarified that to the extent not captured in the Standard Contractual Clauses (when applicable), the rights and obligations of the Parties captured in the DPA will apply.

flags.input_text: In the event of a Personal Data Breach concerning Personal Data Processed by the Processor under this DPA, the Processor shall take appropriate measures to address the Breach, including measures to mitigate its adverse effects. The Processor shall also notify the Controller by e-mail at xyz@xyz.com without undue delay after having become aware of the Breach. Such notification shall contain the details of a contact point where more information can be obtained, a description of the nature of the breach (including, where possible, categories and approximate number of data subjects and personal data records concerned), its likely consequences and the measures taken or proposed to address the breach including, where appropriate, measures to mitigate its possible adverse effects. Where, and in so far as, it is not possible to provide all information at the same time, the initial notification shall contain the information then available and further information shall, as it becomes available, subsequently be provided without undue delay.
flags.matched_playbook_text: In the event of a Personal Data Breach concerning Personal Data Processed by the Processor under this DPA, the Processor shall take appropriate measures to address the Breach, including measures to mitigate its adverse effects. The Processor shall also notify the Controller by e-mail at xyz@xyz.com without undue delay after having become aware of the Breach. Such notification shall contain the details of a contact point where more information can be obtained, a description of the nature of the breach (including, where possible, categories and approximate number of data subjects and personal data records concerned), its likely consequences and the measures taken or proposed to address the breach including, where appropriate, measures to mitigate its possible adverse effects. Where, and in so far as, it is not possible to provide all information at the same time, the initial notification shall contain the information then available and further information shall, as it becomes available, subsequently be provided without undue delay.
flags.raw_text: In the event of a Personal Data Breach concerning Personal Data Processed by the Processor under this DPA, the Processor shall take appropriate measures to address the Breach, including measures to mitigate its adverse effects. The Processor shall also notify the Controller by e-mail at xyz@xyz.com without undue delay after having become aware of the Breach. Such notification shall contain the details of a contact point where more information can be obtained, a description of the nature of the breach (including, where possible, categories and approximate number of data subjects and personal data records concerned), its likely consequences and the measures taken or proposed to address the breach including, where appropriate, measures to mitigate its possible adverse effects. Where, and in so far as, it is not possible to provide all information at the same time, the initial notification shall contain the information then available and further information shall, as it becomes available, subsequently be provided without undue delay.

flags.input_clause_section: DATA PROTECTION IMPACT ASSESSMENT AND PRIOR CONSULTATION
flags.input_text: Processor shall provide commercially reasonable assistance to the Data Controller with any data protection impact assessments, and prior consultations with Supervising Authorities or other competent data privacy authorities, which the Data Controller reasonably considers to be required by article 35 or 36 of the GDPR or equivalent provisions of any other Data Protection Law, in each case solely in relation to Processing of Personal Data by, and taking into account the nature of the Processing and information available to, the Contracted Processors.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Processor shall provide commercially reasonable assistance to the Data Controller with any data protection impact assessments, and prior consultations with Supervising Authorities or other competent data privacy authorities, which the Data Controller reasonably considers to be required by article 35 or 36 of the GDPR or equivalent provisions of any other Data Protection Law, in each case solely in relation to Processing of Personal Data by, and taking into account the nature of the Processing and information available to, the Contracted Processors.
flags.raw_text: Processor shall provide commercially reasonable assistance to the Data Controller with any data protection impact assessments, and prior consultations with Supervising Authorities or other competent data privacy authorities, which the Data Controller reasonably considers to be required by article 35 or 36 of the GDPR or equivalent provisions of any other Data Protection Law, in each case solely in relation to Processing of Personal Data by, and taking into account the nature of the Processing and information available to, the Contracted Processors.

flags.input_text: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, the Data Controller shall not be entitled to conduct any audit on the Processor or inspect the premises of the Processor. If required in writing by any regulatory or governmental authority, the Processor shall share such documents pertaining to the Services rendered by the Processor to the Data Controller under the Agreement. In case, any such information or documents are not readily available, Processor shall furnish the same within a reasonable period of time. It is clarified that save and except for matters arising directly out of this DPA, nothing in this Clause shall require the Processor to share any confidential or proprietary information or any other information connected to its day-to-day business operations, trade secrets, intellectual property or any other matter whatsoever in the course of any such request.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, the Data Controller shall not be entitled to conduct any audit on the Processor or inspect the premises of the Processor. If required in writing by any regulatory or governmental authority, the Processor shall share such documents pertaining to the Services rendered by the Processor to the Data Controller under the Agreement. In case, any such information or documents are not readily available, Processor shall furnish the same within a reasonable period of time. It is clarified that save and except for matters arising directly out of this DPA, nothing in this Clause shall require the Processor to share any confidential or proprietary information or any other information connected to its day-to-day business operations, trade secrets, intellectual property or any other matter whatsoever in the course of any such request.

If required in writing by any regulatory or governmental authority, the Processor shall share such documents pertaining to the Services rendered by the Processor to the Data Controller under the Agreement. In case, any such information or documents are not readily available, Processor shall furnish the same within a reasonable period of time. It is clarified that save and except for matters arising directly out of this DPA, nothing in this Clause shall require the Processor to share any confidential or proprietary information or any other information connected to its day-to-day business operations, trade secrets, intellectual property or any other matter whatsoever in the course of any such request.

flags.input_text: Each Party hereby represents and warrants to the other Party that:
flags.matched_playbook_text: Each Party hereby represents and warrants to the other Party that:
flags.raw_text: Each Party hereby represents and warrants to the other Party that:

flags.input_text: it is a body corporate, duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the Applicable Laws, and has all requisite power and authority to execute this DPA and to perform its obligations hereunder;
flags.matched_playbook_text: it is a body corporate, duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the Applicable Laws, and has all requisite power and authority to execute this DPA and to perform its obligations hereunder;

flags.input_text: it is not bound by any contract, that may restrict its right or ability to enter into or perform this DPA, or which would be breached as a result of execution and performance of this DPA, or that is otherwise inconsistent with this DPA;

flags.input_text: This DPA shall be deemed to have come into effect on and from the date of execution of this DPA and shall be valid, legal, and binding till the duration of the Master Agreement (“Term”). After the expiry of this Term, Parties may choose to extend the term of the Master Agreement and DPA mutually.

flags.input_text: Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Processor will have a right to terminate the DPA:

flags.input_text: immediately, in case of any material breach of this DPA by the Controller, where such breach is not remedial immediately or may result in direct or indirect breach of Applicable Laws by the Processor.

flags.input_text: In case of termination by the Processor pursuant to Section 12.3(ii) above, the Processor shall have no outstanding obligations towards the Data Controller.
flags.matched_playbook_text: In case of termination by the Processor pursuant to Section 12.3(ii) above, the Processor shall have no outstanding obligations towards the Data Controller.
flags.raw_text: In case of termination by the Processor pursuant to Section 12.3(ii) above, the Processor shall have no outstanding obligations towards the Data Controller.

flags.input_text: The Data Controller agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Processor from and against all direct claims, demands, actions, liabilities, costs, interest, damages, and expenses incurred or suffered by the Processor, arising out of any (i) material breach of or non-compliance of this DPA by the Data Controller (or its Personnel), (ii) any breach of Applicable Laws by the Data Controller (or its Personnel) that results in Processor being in breach of the Applicable Laws. For any and third-party claims solely attributable to the Processor’s acts and omissions, the Processor shall assume full control of the defence and shall indemnify the Data Controller against any liabilities, costs, damages and expenses arising out such claims.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Data Controller agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the Processor from and against all direct claims, demands, actions, liabilities, costs, interest, damages, and expenses incurred or suffered by the Processor, arising out of any (i) material breach of or non-compliance of this DPA by the Data Controller (or its Personnel), (ii) any breach of Applicable Laws by the Data Controller (or its Personnel) that results in Processor being in breach of the Applicable Laws. For any and third-party claims solely attributable to the Processor’s acts and omissions, the Processor shall assume full control of the defence and shall indemnify the Data Controller against any liabilities, costs, damages and expenses arising out such claims.

For any and third-party claims solely attributable to the Processor’s acts and omissions, the Processor shall assume full control of the defence and shall indemnify the Data Controller against any liabilities, costs, damages and expenses arising out such claims.

flags.input_text: The rights, powers, privileges, and remedies provided in this indemnity clause are cumulative and not exclusive of any rights, powers, privileges, or remedies provided by law.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The rights, powers, privileges, and remedies provided in this indemnity clause are cumulative and not exclusive of any rights, powers, privileges, or remedies provided by law.
flags.raw_text: The rights, powers, privileges, and remedies provided in this indemnity clause are cumulative and not exclusive of any rights, powers, privileges, or remedies provided by law.

flags.input_text: Third Party Claims: In the event of any third-party claim being raised against the Processor, the Processor may, at its discretion, require the Data Controller to assume the defense of such claim, and the Data Controller shall, at its sole cost and expense promptly do the needful. Provided that the Data Controller shall not enter into any settlement, consent order, or entry into judgement, without prior written consent of the Processor. If the Data Controller fails to assume the defence within 30 days of being notified by the Processor in this regard, the Processor shall be at liberty to assume control, take appropriate actions to dispute, resist, appeal, compromise, defend, remedy or mitigate, or enter into any settlement, consent order or judgment in respect of such third-party claim at the sole cost and expense of the Controller, which must be reimbursed at actuals, and the Controller shall be bound by the same.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Third Party Claims: In the event of any third-party claim being raised against the Processor, the Processor may, at its discretion, require the Data Controller to assume the defense of such claim, and the Data Controller shall, at its sole cost and expense promptly do the needful. Provided that the Data Controller shall not enter into any settlement, consent order, or entry into judgement, without prior written consent of the Processor. If the Data Controller fails to assume the defence within 30 days of being notified by the Processor in this regard, the Processor shall be at liberty to assume control, take appropriate actions to dispute, resist, appeal, compromise, defend, remedy or mitigate, or enter into any settlement, consent order or judgment in respect of such third-party claim at the sole cost and expense of the Controller, which must be reimbursed at actuals, and the Controller shall be bound by the same.
flags.raw_text: Third Party Claims: In the event of any third-party claim being raised against the Processor, the Processor may, at its discretion, require the Data Controller to assume the defense of such claim, and the Data Controller shall, at its sole cost and expense promptly do the needful. Provided that the Data Controller shall not enter into any settlement, consent order, or entry into judgement, without prior written consent of the Processor. If the Data Controller fails to assume the defence within 30 days of being notified by the Processor in this regard, the Processor shall be at liberty to assume control, take appropriate actions to dispute, resist, appeal, compromise, defend, remedy or mitigate, or enter into any settlement, consent order or judgment in respect of such third-party claim at the sole cost and expense of the Controller, which must be reimbursed at actuals, and the Controller shall be bound by the same.

flags.input_text: The Data Controller agrees that any breach of its obligations under this DPA may cause the Processor irreparable harm which cannot be fully compensated by monetary damages. Accordingly, in addition to any other remedies the Processor may have at law or in equity, the Processor shall be entitled to seek immediate injunction and other equitable relief to prevent any further or continuing breach of obligations.
flags.matched_playbook_text: The Data Controller agrees that any breach of its obligations under this DPA may cause the Processor irreparable harm which cannot be fully compensated by monetary damages. Accordingly, in addition to any other remedies the Processor may have at law or in equity, the Processor shall be entitled to seek immediate injunction and other equitable relief to prevent any further or continuing breach of obligations.

Accordingly, in addition to any other remedies the Processor may have at law or in equity, the Processor shall be entitled to seek immediate injunction and other equitable relief to prevent any further or continuing breach of obligations.

flags.input_text: Any and all claims for indemnification arising out of or relating to the Processing of Personal Data, whether asserted by the Data Controller or the Processor, shall be governed exclusively by the specific indemnification provisions set forth under this DPA. The Parties hereby expressly acknowledge and agree that they shall not seek, claim, or pursue any remedy, relief, or indemnification relating in this regard under any other agreement between the Parties.

The Parties hereby expressly acknowledge and agree that they shall not seek, claim, or pursue any remedy, relief, or indemnification relating in this regard under any other agreement between the Parties.

flags.input_text: NEITHER PARTY WILL BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, EXEMPLARY OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES IN CONNECTION WITH OR ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT, HOWEVER IT ARISES, WHETHER FOR BREACH OR IN TORT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, EVEN IF THAT PARTY HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.

flags.input_text: NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING TO THE CONTRARY HEREIN, IN NO EVENT SHALL THE PROCESSOR’S TOTAL CUMULATIVE LIABILITY ARISING UNDER THIS DPA, EXCEED ONE HUNDRED PERCENT OF THE CHARGES RECEIVED BY THE PROCESSOR FROM THE DATA CONTROLLER UNDER THE MASTER AGREEMENT IN THE PRECENDING 12 MONTHS FROM THE DATE OF CLAIM.

flags.input_text: Dispute Resolution: The provisions pertaining to Dispute Resolution in the Master Agreement shall apply mutatis mutandis to this agreement.

flags.input_text: Entire Agreement: The Master Agreement along with the DPA and all annexures, appendices constitute the entire and final and exclusive statement of the agreement between the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous discussions, communications, negotiations and agreements, written or oral, with respect to the subject matter hereof.
flags.matched_playbook_text: Entire Agreement: The Master Agreement along with the DPA and all annexures, appendices constitute the entire and final and exclusive statement of the agreement between the Parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous discussions, communications, negotiations and agreements, written or oral, with respect to the subject matter hereof.

flags.input_text: Relationship between Parties: This DPA is being entered into on a principal-to-principal basis. Nothing in this Agreement or in any document referred to in it shall constitute any Party a partner of the other, nor shall the execution, completion and implementation of this DPA confer on any Party any power to bind or impose any obligation on the other Party.

flags.input_text: Notices: All notices to be sent by a Party in connection with this DPA shall be in writing and shall be delivered by registered post to the Party at the addresses mentioned hereinabove or as may be notified by one Party to the other in writing from time to time.

flags.input_text: Assignment: The Controller shall not without obtaining the prior written consent of the Data Controller, assign or transfer this DPA or its obligations thereunder to any other party. The Processor may assign this DPA or any part thereof, without prior notice or consent of the Processor.

flags.input_text: Amendments and Waivers: No modification or amendment to this Agreement and no waiver of any of the terms or conditions hereto shall be valid or binding unless made in writing and duly executed by the Parties.

flags.input_text: Severability: If any provision of this Agreement should be held invalid, illegal or unenforceable, the validity, legality and enforceability of the remaining provisions will not in any way be affected or impaired thereby, and such provision will be deemed restated to reflect the original intention of the Parties as nearly as possible in accordance with Applicable Law.
